channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2023101285
item.description:
Report X-2023101285

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-21T18:13:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-13
  • City: NORFOLK
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered to be wet at unload. It was immediately put in a HazMat tote and set aside. Unsure when exactly it started leaking or for how long before discovery. Package was improperly repacked in a HazMat bag closed with a zip-tie and then a cardboard box at station 753 by 9266077. Inside of the bag was wet from product leaking. DescribePack: Appears leak occurred from a malfunctioning vent cap DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a HazMat tote
